sn14.25:1.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element:
sn14.25:1.3: those who kill living creatures with those who kill living creatures,
sn14.25:1.7: consume beer, wine, and liquor intoxicants …
sn14.25:2.1: Those who refrain from killing living creatures …
sn14.25:2.5: those who refrain from consuming beer, wine, and liquor intoxicants with those who refrain from consuming beer, wine, and liquor intoxicants.”
